name: Blockout (itch) (YakuzaBalooza)
description:
A game developed in Unreal Engine 4 for My First Game Jam: Summer 2022. Jump through 6 levels with blockout-like visuals as you aim for a fast time!

CREDITS:

VISUALS

  • Models were made using Blender.
  • Grid material tutorial by Nick Mower.

AUDIO

  • Sound effects were made using Chiptone.
  • Music comes from RMN Music Pack. Tracks used are Smalltalk, Cool Stuff, and Puzzles.
